main event: A sighting of a silver object with red tips, exhibiting intermittent exhaust, observed in Garden City, Michigan in March 1963.
interesting points: The object flew horizontally before disappearing after about 10 seconds of observation., The sighting occurred during a storm while the witnesses were in a parked car., The object had characteristics similar to both an aircraft and a balloon, but the evaluation was inconclusive., Witnesses expressed amazement and uncertainty about what they saw., The sighting report includes correspondence with military personnel regarding the event.
sighted object: one silver object with red tips
witness description: friends who were parked in a car during a storm
